channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-11170] ZKDelegationTokenSecretManager fails to renewToken created by a peer
item.description:
When a ZKDTSM tries to renew a token created by a peer, It throws an Exception with message :
"bar is trying to renew a token with wrong password"
item.summary: ZKDelegationTokenSecretManager fails to renewToken created by a peer

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Uploading initial patch.
Re-uploading after rebase with HADOOP-11122
